item.description:
Board the Post Road Stages Bus at the Spencer St. Commuter Lot in Manchester at 9:30 am. Exit 1 off I 384, Manchester.

$20 pp. round trip.

You will receive a $30 Mohegan Sun Bonus of $20 Free Bet and a $10 Food Coupon or towards Seasons Buffet.

Bus departs Casino at 4:30 pm.

No advance registration required, just show up at the commuter lot to board.

Directions from Mass.:
I 91 S to exit 35A (I 291);
From I 291 take I 84 W exit toward I 384/Hartford; Stay in right lane.
Take Exit 1 (Spencer St). At lite take Left onto Spencer St.;
At next lite take Left. Commuter Lot on Left.

Directions from Hartford:
I 84 E to I 384 E. Take exit 1. At end of exit take Left (Spencer St). At next lite take Left. Commuter Lot on Left.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Bus Trip to Mohegan Sun Casino
